main.name: Rishonath Siva
main.description: I am passionate about learning new technologies and languages to expand my skillset & M.E.R.N full stack enthusiastic
main.bio: My name is Risho, I'm a ReactJS Developer. Currently working as a freelance front-end developer. Looking for more opportunities to develop my skills on Web development, desinging and experience with different technologies and different teams.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: I am a Front-end developer with extensive knowledge in HTML, CSS / SASS, JavaScript. I have hands-on experience in React.js, Git, Bootstrap, Responsive Web Design, Testing, and debugging. I'm in the process of learning RESTful Service/API and Content Management System (CMS), Mongo DB, Express.js, and Node.js to be a Full Stack M.E.R.N developer. I am passionate about learning new technologies and languages to expand my skillset. I consider myself a real team player with excellent communication skills who understands the importance of teamwork, collaboration, and open communication.

education.school: Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology
education.description: Studied Modern trends of web designing and development along with UI/UX designing basics and process of implementation.

work.title: Freelancing Developer
work.description: Building Responsive web applications and UI/UX based designings .
